name: Burek Rope 2
description:
Kontrolisi Burek kako bi dosao do cilja, a samim time i zaradio. Pare trosi u prodavnici kako bi poboljsao i olaksao igru. Zaradi sto vise para i budi broj jedan na leaderboard-u. 

Kontrole: Space ili RMB

Info:

Version: 1.2
Version name: Multiplayer
Version release date: 1st Aug 2022.
Author: MBH Dev
Developed in: July 2022.

Minimum System Requirements:
CPU: If you can look at pictures, you're good.
RAM: 1MB RAM
GPU: If you can see this, you're good.
OS: Windows, Linux, Android, Fax
